import React from 'react'; import { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import {Button, Dropdown} from 'react-bootstrap'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; const Dashboard = () => { const [firstChoice, setFirstChoice] = useState(''); const [secondChoice, setSecondChoice] = useState(''); const handleFirstChoiceChange = (event) => { setFirstChoice(event.target.value); // Reset second choice when the first choice changes setSecondChoice(''); }; const handleButtonClick = () => { // Prepare data to send to the backend const data = { firstChoice: firstChoice, secondChoice: secondChoice }; // Make an HTTP POST request to your backend endpoint fetch('/api/getDoc', { method: 'POST', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, body: JSON.stringify(data) }) .then(response => { if (response.ok) { console.log('Data sent successfully'); // // Reset choices after successful submission if needed // setFirstChoice(''); // setSecondChoice(''); } else { throw new Error('Failed to send data'); } }) .catch(error => { console.error('Error:', error); }); }; return (
